articles.title: Fantasy Football Stock Watch: The Titans Have *Two* Great WRs | Fantasy Football News, Rankings and Projections - Pro Football Focus
articles.description: Tennessee Titans wide receivers A.J. Brown and Corey Davis are both top-17 fantasy WRs on a per-game basis and head into the fantasy playoffs in smashable spots.
articles.content: The Titans are in a dog fight with the Colts for the AFC South crown, and the franchise appears to be well on its way to locking up its fifth-straight season with at least nine wins. Ryan Tannehill a… [+8323 chars]
